bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: The Virginia Fair Housing Board was established in 2003 and given the authority to "administer and enforce state and federal fair housing laws". The Fair Housing Board seeks to ensure that discrimination does not occur in the following areas, race or color, national origin, sex, age, disability or family status in regard to selling or renting property. Statutes Title 36, Chapter 5.1 gives the entire Fair Housing Regulation law. The Fair Housing Board also offers an educational certificate program to assist individuals that sell or rent property in abiding by the fair housing code regulations.
